verses.roman:
śraddadhānāya bhaktāya
vinītāyānasūyave
bhūteṣu kṛta-maitrāya
śuśrūṣābhiratāya ca

synonyms: śraddadhānāya—faithful; bhaktāya—to the devotee; vinītāya—respectful; anasūyave—nonenvious; bhūteṣu—to all living entities; kṛta-maitrāya—friendly; śuśrūṣā—faithful service; abhiratāya—eager to render; ca—and.
translation: Instruction should be given to the faithful devotee who is respectful to the spiritual master, nonenvious, friendly to all kinds of living entities and eager to render service with faith and sincerity.
